name: KeyNote (eden)
description:
Being an idol is already hard enough, but what about when you're also secretly a magical girl that's been selected to defend your home town?!

It's your job to help this new magical girl who's been locked in place by her enemy by using your melody to break the binds! The controls are simple [DFJK] or ARROW keys if you prefer!

Anyways this was a really fun jam and I really challenged myself with a whole new genre of game (and the hell that was creating a beatmap for this song). Maybe I'll come back to this in the future and add some more silly features. I know I definitely wanted to add a bit more in terms of animation and sound effects but sadly ran short on time ):

Thank you so much for your time and for playing! <3

Credit:
Art and Programming: Me! (Eden) (@nekomaidann on twitter)
Music: My boyfriend who has no social media he wants to share<3

Programs used:
Clip Studio Paint for the artwork and the Unity Engine for game development!
